MajorClaims.Text: reading fiction is more enjoyable than watching movies

Claims.Text: these books have more depth, are much easier to use, and more useful for language learners
fiction books pay more attention to details
reading a novel is more convenient

Premises.Text: we can know characters, places, and times of a novel very well during reading it
Most of the novels describe not only main characters but also other people in the novels, where each scene is happening
after I read animal farms which is a story of Russian revolution, I could understand the leaders and different segments of the Russian people
a movie just gives us a very small review of its stories and characters
Some novels have around 100 pages and readers cannot finish them in just one hour
Yet these people can continue to read their novels wherever they find free time such as in bus or trains
I have started to read a novel since last week
I do not have enough time to read a novel in one day, so I usually read it when I am coming home from English class
I cannot watch a complete movie
I can just sit in front of TV for 15 minutes and after that, I have to study
they can learn many things such as learning a language by watching movies
movies are not a good idea to learn a language for beginners
characters in movies speak very fast and unclear for language learners
For these learners it is better to start by reading some novels which are more comprehensible and enjoyable
